notes:
Introduced in [[Summer Update 2010]].
{{JSpoiler|Part of the [[Wrath of the Emperor Quest]].}}
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-400?}}|{{Ability|Great Mana Drain Beam|0-2398|element=manadrain}}|{{Ability|Small Poison Wave|0-500?|element=poison}}|{{Ability|Ultimate Poison Explosion|poisons you up to 30hp/turn|element=poisoned}}|{{Healing}} }}
name: Snake Thing
location: East of [[Zao]] and south of [[Dragonblaze Peaks]], two floors below [[Zalamon]].
strategy: Trap him as fast as you can, knights will have to use challenge often since this creature tends to switch very often. [[Fire Bomb|Fire]] and [[Energy Bomb]]s will be helpful here.
